body.description: Add a classic, simple, storage solution to your bedroom with the Prepac Astrid 4-Drawer Chest. It's contemporary design and clean lines will complement any decor. Profiled drawer fronts and solid wood knobs help provide a timeless look. Use on its own or pair it with other matching pieces from the Astrid Collection. Constructed from non-toxic, CARB-2 compliant, laminated composite woods with a sturdy MDF backer. Ships Ready to Assemble, includes an instruction booklet for easy assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Got 3 of them. They're great.
reviews.reviewText: Ok so I absolutely love these and while I wish they were a bit deeper I wouldn't trade them for the world.1) If I knew how straightforward they would be to put together I'd have paid more money. Great instructions and easy to follow2) I love that it has actual drawer slides. Just so much nicer and quieter.3) They feel pretty sturdy overall and I like them.They're the first "real adult" dressers I've gotten and they're a huge improvement. The finish isn't super durable but it's a dresser not a cutting board I don't think it's a real negative.I'm thrilled I got these. Until I decide to get a complete bedroom set these are going to be awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Affordable, easy to assemble, surprisingly sturdy for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Drawer bottoms are flimsy, otherwise so far so good
reviews.reviewText: You always have to keep in mind that you get what you pay for. Buying cheaper furniture, you're not going to find solid oak built to last 100 years. This is an MDF dresser, and will most likely last as long as you would expect cheaper MDF furniture to last. Not just for this item, but for all cheaper items, you should always keep that in mind when purchasing. You want super solid, then spend more.With that out of the way, I set up this dresser and it has been in use for about a week. The only complaint I have is that one of the drawer bottoms came out of the package damaged. The edge was ripped about a half an inch in, which obviously would make it useless. I did not even attempt to contact the seller, so I cannot speak upon if they would have replaced it or not. What I did instead is go to Lowes and for ten dollars, I purchased a 4x4 sheet of hardboard, and cut it myself. This is a little sturdier than the drawer bottoms provided, so I used it for all 4 sheets. The drawer bottoms are usually the first thing to go on most cheaper built drawers whether we're talking dressers or cabinets or anything like that, so it was well worth it to me. If you do not have the tools or do not want to spend the time to do this, you should still be ok with the material provided. I want to stress, having bought a lot of cheaper furniture in my life, this is not an issue specific to this item. You will find similar issues with everything at this price point.Now that I have it all set up and put together, it seems fairly solid. It's not wobbly or anything like that. The drawer slides are smooth, and they are metal with wheels, not some clunky groove type slides that rubs against the sides.Overall, I'd say for this price, I'm glad I purchased this dresser. I can't speak to durability or anything like that yet, but if I run into any issues in the future, I will be sure to come back and update.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy easy to build and looks amazing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So Flimsy and Poorly Made
reviews.reviewText: I’m a civil engineer, so I have no issues following directions and setting up furniture. This four drawer item was just bad: the manufacturer wood would split without almost any torque, leaving the screws that’s supposed to be inside the wood exposed, so I had to try to screw in the pieces with my own small screws to get it to fix the manufacturer’s exposed pieces. Even with delicacy, the wood still splint so I was unable to literally set up any pieces other than the drawers (which some screws wouldn’t fit properly, so I had to add a tiny piece of wood instead the screw placing so that the screw would actually fit properly. On top of all that, the instructions were so unclear as to which way pieces fit, so I found myself unscrewing the door slides and having to switch sides at least 6 different times.Like I said, I’m a civil engineer, I build roads and buldings, I have no issues following directions/plans and I have no issue building furniture, and you get what you pay for, but for $150 dollars, this item was so poorly made I felt compelled to warn others.If you do purchase, be extremely careful with attaching parts as they are very prone to splitting the wood.I received the item Friday, spend all day Saturday trying to assemble the item, and I was unable finishe due to the poor quality. I submitted a return that same Saturday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the look, but the quality could have been better. They didn't cost much, so I guess I got what I paid for. They aren't hard to assemble, just takes time. The drawers slide in and out easily, which is definitely a plus. It's a good size. I love the way it looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Closet upgrade solution
reviews.reviewText: My closet upgrade, reno has grown bigger in size, expense, and details but boy am I happy I jumped in and created a new space with a place for everything in my wardrobe. I purchased one of these press board cabinets and was amazed at how easy to assemble. I was cheaper than my local Lowe's and delivered to my door. I decided six months into this project to mirror both sides and purchased another unit and it arrived in perfect condition and bang! I had it together and installed on the left side. I will post pictures showing these units when I have completed the last of this rehab. Yes I highly recommend this cabinet for my use but I am not sure of the safety of it for child's room even with the attachment they provide in shippping. Since I installed two you can say I am happy with my purchase.
Bought this dresser for my elderly mother and she absolutely loves it,it was easy to put together and this dresser is very sturdy I highly recommend buying this dresser
It looks great only thing is the drawers a bit flimsy but easy to put together

reviews.reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: Looks a bit cheap. There are gaps between the drawers, but I wasn’t expecting perfection for under $200. Easy enough to assemble but don’t tighten screws too much or you may split the particle board.
I like that these dressers r nice n sturdy id like real wood but for lam press its really a nice dresser perfect for my kids
